website_summaries.verdict: Easy to use for cooking eggs in their shells and it comes with seven holders instead of the standard six.
pros: Safe to use as they are made from nonstick egg cookers
Cups are durable and made from 100% nontoxic, BPA-free silicone
cons: A very large pot is required to use properly because of the extra holder

customer_reviews.title: These are great. I eat very fresh eggs from friends who ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I eat very fresh eggs from friends who raise chickens. The fresher the egg the harder to peel when hard boiled. The egglettes eliminate the problem. As I personally eat about 2 dozen eggs per week this is my "new favorite toy". Just be sure to use your favorite oil or spray before cooking and use the holder to keep them upright in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K Keller

customer_reviews.title: Turned out as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Received the egglettes with holder. The holder is a must. Sprayed the inside with olive oil as suggested by other posters. Helped tremendously in getting the eggs out of the cups. We did have to use a spoon to go around the eggs a little on some of them (probably didn’t spray the cups good enough). The white holder thing to pull them out of the water was weak and came off. But other than that, very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B.

customer_reviews.title: More predictable results.
customer_reviews.text: The holder was very helpful. We did use all six the first time so it was some work but I expect a learning curve as we use it. All eggs turned out fine and it probably would be easier to do a couple of eggs. Overall it’s more predictable results make it better.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.TE

customer_reviews.title: THEY work. I don't.
customer_reviews.text: I love soft boiled eggs for breakfast. Used to spend a lot of time peeling eggs before. Ruined a lot of them. Tried all the tricks. NO MORE. Theze things are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jack McNally

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a quick breakfast
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a quick breakfast, and fast shipping from a very responsive seller. Thank you so much, I love them!
customer_reviews.author: greeneyedkschic

customer_reviews.title: Nasty!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I when I received them they came in no packaging just a bag and no instructions. I contacted them and they were very nice and helped me out with it. But when I used them I followed instructions and it did work but texture is weird but the worst thing about them is that the egg tastes disgusting. It tasted like a chemical was on it. Maybe from the silicone it is cooked in. Contacted them again but no response to this issue. Total waste of money I would not recommend this product at all. Gross!! Peel your eggs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they didn't come out looking as smooth as I'd like, so I gave them four stars
customer_reviews.text: I had a issue at first With the eggs sticking to the sides, but that was my fault. If you get these , remember to spray the Inside with oil first. I'm still testing them, they didn't come out looking as smooth as I'd like, so I gave them four stars. If you get these watch some of the videos on how to use them. It takes about 15 minutes for hard boiled eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Djbrown4274

customer_reviews.title: I don't like to write negative reviews
customer_reviews.text: I so wanted this egglette system to work as advertised. However, There were no instructions, so I had to go to the internet to find how to use them. I followed the video I found. I washed, I oiled the cups, screwed the parts together with some difficulty, and put the filled cups into boiling water. After 15 minutes, I took them out and put them in cold water. When it was time to empty the egg cups, some stuck,, some were not completely cooked, and some had water in the cups along with the eggs. I don't like to write negative reviews. But this product was so disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille Warren

customer_reviews.title: They work!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous as I have seen mixed reviews on this product, but just like I expected they worked! I sprayed a little oil in them cracked open an egg put some salt and pepper and they came out perfect. Next time I'll be trying it with some cheese and tomato. This will be great especially to buy some egg beaters to make egg whites. I'm sure you're going to love it just like I do!
customer_reviews.author: Fatima Coll

customer_reviews.title: Must use Jumbo size eggs
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it. I used large eggs and it gave them one round side and one flat top. I used Pam spray and they didn't stick but they had a weird rough texture. I will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife really likes them. says Pam spray is a must
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 6 egg cooker Shaliyan
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when my eggs cooked & came out without a problem. I sprayed with Olive Pam & then rubbed the little soft cup & they didn't stick. They are great for egg salad but it's harder to make deviled eggs because the egg top is flat so your egg is shorter than usual. There are many egg cookers on the market. I'm so glad I got this one with 6 cups and a holder so they won't turn over while boiling. When I am putting egg in cup, I put the holder over a round cake pan & that helps while I am filling them... Kay in NC 10.5.18
customer_reviews.author: KayM

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: It was fun making eggs with my 9 year old grandson. When they came out they were the shape of an egg on one end and flat on the other. I love the caddy! I will experiment with omelets and other recipes. Overall, I liked it and I'm glad I bought it. (Buying the one with the caddy was a really good choice!) Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: 65vettecrazy

customer_reviews.title: no instructions
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much works but came with no instruction sheet. How long do I cook for hard boiled or soft boiled? You just have to guess.
customer_reviews.author: A. Baumgardner

customer_reviews.title: NOT what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had a chance to use it yet but the flower shaped part that is supposed to hold the cups in place was not included in the shipment. What a huge rip off. I will leave another review after I give it a try but supposedly the egg cups turn upside down and leak without the stabilizer.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising and Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: First, these are obviously knock offs and the box reflects that - it even uses the term “egglettes” and the phrase “as seen on TV”. Second, this package does not include the tray to set the poaching cups in for boiling, despite the description clearly detailing it as included. Finally, compared to Egglette-branded poaching cups, these were made of very thin silicone and the plastic lids seemed to be made of lighter plastic. Some of the lids did not want to thread properly with the collars. I don’t think these would stand up well to frequent use or regular washing in the dishwasher. I ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh.  Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily to make hard boiled eggs because I really do have a hard time removing the shell. It's kind of a hassle. You definitely need to oil/butter the interior or your eggs will stick to the inside. They will fly around your dishwasher. You cannot stand them up in a pot boiling water -- they fall over. So, even if you're using one, use the holder. The taste is not horrible, but it is off. I am assume there are chemicals leeching into the egg. I also wind up with fluid on the top, looks like that yucky white stuff from when you fry them. Could stand improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: It really works the eggs pop right out. I originally gave the item 2 stars because it was missing one of the plastic rims and lid. Shaliyan immediately corrected the mistake by sending a whole new set. They were so kind and very efficient. I really do love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lari Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: First time I used these they worked great! Second time they started leaking, I couldnt even screw the tops on right. They are hard to clean, dishwasher wont do it, only hand washing. We decided peeling was far easier than using these. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It was supposed to come with a holder but there wasn’t one. we’re extremely helpful! Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gisela  Altamirano

customer_reviews.title: Best Egg Cooker!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Eggette one first, the eggs kept flipping over while cooking. This one provides a ring that the Eggs holders fit into keeping them upright while boiling. Like it MUCH better, and both sets fit this holder!!! HIGHLY recommend this vendor, fast service, excellent followup.
customer_reviews.author: Maricopa Newbie

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: First of all, by the time you spray and fill the egg cups , screw on the lids , put them in the holder, and then afterward loosen to get them out, and clean all the egg cups, you could easily boil and peel the eggs faster. Secondly, the tops of the eggs are flat and you couldn't use them for deviled eggs or any nice presentation. Definitely not a time saver
customer_reviews.author: Babette

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't come with instructions. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't come with instructions so you can't tell what you're supposed to do exactly until you've ruined at least three dozen eggs and by then you figure out it wasn't worth it. They don't cook right for soft-boiled and you have to scrape them out because they do stick. Tried boiling them AND microwaving them, and got the same results. You can't tell if they're undercooked or overcooked or just right. If you leave them in the microwaved for one whole minute expect either the cap explodes in your face or the yolk. So it's not for me. I'll go back to poaching in water and vinegar.
customer_reviews.author: Ann-Margret "Maggie" Yonan

customer_reviews.title: Product is not good.  Not even close to original product.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift and i was very disappointed that it did not come boxed. I had purchased the original set from Bed Bath and Beyond. The quality of the original purchase far surpasses the quality of this set. Since this did not come in a box, I still had to go buy a nicer set from the store. I kept this set for myself. Very disappointing. Thin, flimsy. Tops don't fit well, neck rings dont stay on. Bad product quality start to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye1253

customer_reviews.title: great idea but not practical
customer_reviews.text: item box was crushed. Handling is very sloppy, needed a stand so you could work with eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Chaffinch

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown in ad!!
customer_reviews.text: The product did not come as describe, it came only with the little egg cookers, NO HOLDERS TO PLACE THEM INTO THE PAN, NO COOKBOOK AS SHOWN! Works but disappointed! Move onto another vendor that delivers what they show in their ads!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis M.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: These do make hard boiled eggs. The eggs are not smooth or shaped like a egg. They are flat on top. The yolk is at the top so your deviled eggs will be missing one end. I sprayed them with oil and the white still stuck to the cup which was very hard to get off. Threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: CJC

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set. My first set did not come with the holder but I absolutely love how these work. I'm trying to lose weight and love hard boiled eggs and these fit the bill to a tee.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive what I ordered. Instead of receiving the Shaliyan Egg Cookers and holder, I received a different brand of pods without a holder. They are terrible. Without a holder, they tip over and leak water into the pod and leak egg into the pan of boiling water.
customer_reviews.author: StrayPup

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money buying this product.
customer_reviews.text: Eggs stick to Silicone. More time and trouble than just peeling the egg shell. Can't recommend anyone buying your product. I threw the whole thing out in the garbage. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Al Chisholm

customer_reviews.title: Works okay but I wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.text: Egg sticks to the silicon after it is cooked, so the eggs don't look very pretty when they come out. If you aren't trying to have fancy eggs then you may like it. Still think that I would have spent just as much time on making hard boiled eggs if I just did it the old fashioned way.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M Corl

customer_reviews.title: So much more easy to make hard boiled eggs
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter for Christmas. She loves to make deviled eggs and since my brother was saying how great these where I thought they would be perfect gift and they were.
customer_reviews.author: Donia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter who loves hard boiled eggs and I expected to receive what I paid for. What I received was a bag full of plastic parts. No box. No recipe book. Will definitely return. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of Goats

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Shows and states it comes with a holder, it did not. States non-stick, they are not. Covers difficult to screw on. Tried them once and could not get the egg out without the help of a spoon. Tried to clean them before putting in the dishwasher. Scrubbed with a scouring pad and could not get the egg off. In the garbage they went.
customer_reviews.author: RMan

customer_reviews.title: Price and service was good, but....
customer_reviews.text: Even thought the price and service was good, it was not a good experience using the product. Much more labor intensive using the product than just hard boiling eggs the traditional way and the clean up was a pain in the neck compared to traditional boiling of eggs. Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ward

customer_reviews.title: 20-22 minutes to boil 6 eggs
customer_reviews.text: Found the time to put together, boil 20 minutes; then were a real pain to clean residue left inside .. not sure if it’s worth using to avoid pealing shells.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and clean. Fun and delicious recipes. The customer service follow-up to make sure I was pleased was outstanding and made me feel like I was their most important customer. Think I'll order a few more for "stocking stuffers" this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen R

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS SHOWN!!
customer_reviews.text: This shows the egg holders, tray, cookbook etc.... THE ONLY PRODUCT THAT ARRIVED WAS 6 CUPS WITH LIDS!! THAT’S ALL!!! MISLEADING ADVERTISING..RIP OFF!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no more peeling
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I hate to peel a egg just to loose half of it with the shell. These do a great job and now I always have hard boiled eggs on hand , great little product.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Z.

customer_reviews.title: Too Much Work For Prep!
customer_reviews.text: Excited to try...but why? Was I lazy? Was this a better way? No!!! More time to prep than worth the trouble. Maybe the stuffed egg receipe??? I would not recommend this hyped product. The good news was that it was not expensive.
customer_reviews.author: The Nuke

customer_reviews.title: So easy to make hard boiled eggs
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t get the holder with mine, but I used skewers to hold them in place and it worked fine. I greased them with olive oil, cooked them, cooled them in ice water, and they popped right out of the container. They are flat on one side, but other than that they turned out perfect. The taste is a little off (not bad) because of the olive oil, but so much easier than peeling shells. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erin T.

customer_reviews.title: Eggcellent Product and seller!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. I tried it out with my daughter and we both agree that it beats having to peel the shell off! We received in a in a timely manner and again we are quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! This is the second set I purchased, I use them every week. I hate to peel boiled eggs, this eliminates that altogether. The wrap on this shipment was torn, no big deal, except that I can only find 5 of the 6 red rings that are used at the top of each egglet. I have six cups, six lids, but just 5 rings But, it could be that one was lost in the packaging. Anway, these are a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B Dunson

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Useless product. Eggs stick, doesn't cook well. Don't waste your money..a total failure of a product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy as it implies
customer_reviews.text: Tried these numerous times and the eggs never cooked properly (initially following the time recommended, progressively adding more time). The cleanup was ridiculous—it’s easier to remove the shells than to clean the holders!
customer_reviews.author: MGR

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to clean
customer_reviews.text: These things are impossible to clean. More hassle than cracking egg shells. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: EmilyAnne Skinner

customer_reviews.title: ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: We have had these before. We love them. To be totally honest, one of the six was missing a part that the cap screwed onto. But we are OK with that, for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Frank S.

customer_reviews.title: Did I buy used or new??
customer_reviews.text: I was missing the holder and timer. There were no instructuons included in the box and the box wasn't sealed. Since the cups and lids were all in a sealed bag I hoped they had not been used. I'm attempting to use them for the first time right now. I used the video included with product photos for instructions for use.
customer_reviews.author: Terra Russell

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. As long as follow the instructions and suggestions, it works!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured and easy to use. Just don't forget to spray the molds with some sort of cooking spray, butter, etc. beforehand; otherwise they are difficult to clean out.
customer_reviews.author: Cydnei

customer_reviews.title: No peeling is a great asset. No instructions though
customer_reviews.text: No peeling is a great asset. No instructions though. The holder is too large for any pots I have so I floated six in a pot. Worked well once I ditched the holder.
customer_reviews.author: George E Gaskill

customer_reviews.title: leaky
customer_reviews.text: Somehow water is getting inside with the egg and this leaves a poached texture.. so far I'm not very impressed, but it is still easier then peeling eggs
customer_reviews.author: Michael Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Sticks
customer_reviews.text: Even though oiled, the eggs stick to the inside. I have an Egglettd brand and when oiled, the eggs come out easily.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: They work...
customer_reviews.text: Kinda hard to take apart and put together... hard to clean...but they work the way they should...,
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My egglettes kept flipping over while boiling causing much frustration, so I bought this and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: cindylou89

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job for Ice cubes.
customer_reviews.text: The reason that I got it was for eggs. They can't be cleaned right so I am now using the ones we didn't use yet for ice cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oil the cups!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, and worked as expected. Definitely need to oil the cups first-don’t skip!
customer_reviews.author: Waddles

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, bad taste
customer_reviews.text: I really like the concept and the eggs come out perfect...but they have an awful taste to them and I’m not sure if it’s the silicone or what. I’ve tried several different batches of eggs and got consistently the same result. Unfortunately I feel like this was a waste of money for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lame.
customer_reviews.text: Fussy product. Makes eggs that look like 30% of it is cut off.
customer_reviews.author: DustyBeard

customer_reviews.title: horrible
customer_reviews.text: While trying to boil them I used a pan just big enough for the silicone holders, every holder fell over and filled with water and it was hard to get the eggs out of them, so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did it work?
customer_reviews.text: It did not work as expected. I followed directions exactly as advised. Egglets kept falling over, leaked eggs into water, threw in garbage and would never try them again. Would never recommend them!!
customer_reviews.author: ann e. s.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, sadly a bad product
customer_reviews.text: This product was a great disappointment. So much easier to garbage disposal the shells. They leaked, tipped over, were hard to get oit and did not look pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Christeen Smith

customer_reviews.title: S
customer_reviews.text: They are a wonderful addition to cooking! They work just like it says.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: NO Box as displayed
customer_reviews.text: This item did NOT come in a box as displayed and with computer sheet of minimal usage. Would have gotten this from the store if I had known. This is a gift for my mother. Going to have to go to the store to get one with a box and add these to it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Brown

customer_reviews.title: Ummm, better than boiling an egg without this product.
customer_reviews.text: Little messy. Easy to use. Not easy to clean. Not all seals are good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product fine
customer_reviews.text: Product worked well for me, but will need to figure out cooking time as I over cooked the eggs. I think you should remove the picture of the cookbook as I thought I would be getting that as well. I realize now the cook book is not in the description. Thank you,
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Changes egg texture
customer_reviews.text: The eggs no longer have the same texture as if you were to hard boil them. You can taste oil that’s required to get them out of the egglette onde cooked and they taste of a rubbery consistency. Wouldn’t no recommend to replace hard boiling and peeling eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not that much easier
customer_reviews.text: I found that cleaning out the little holders to be more labor intensive than just shelling the eggs.
customer_reviews.author: JSE

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Cook the mess outta some eggs. i should have bought 2 of them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uneven Looking eggs but does work.
customer_reviews.text: Works OK but eggs are uneven and even with spray oil a little hard to get out.
customer_reviews.author: Pensacola Bill

customer_reviews.title: Prompt shipping
customer_reviews.text: I use this for the eggs from my chickens. It is much easier than trying to peel the shells off fresh eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly.....
customer_reviews.text: Egg cups did not stay together and eggs were floating in the water.
customer_reviews.author: DebraLynn Kjoniksen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This item is easy to use, but when put in boiling water they often fall over. They are not easy to clean as there is some egg residue that forms on the side of the eggables. I don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: aer

customer_reviews.title: Like the product
customer_reviews.text: Did not get the booklet with it just a one paper instruction sheetbut like the product
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This product makes life so much easier. It works just as advertised and I would recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Zeeker

customer_reviews.title: It is a great way to cook eggs
customer_reviews.text: It is a great way to cook eggs. I would have given it 5 stars, but the silicon brush to put the oil in the egg cups was missing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Count all your pieces right away.
customer_reviews.text: I am missing 1 collar and 1 lid was not threaded so it is useless. Quality control is poor and whomever packaged it could not count.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Miller

customer_reviews.title: Egg cookers
customer_reviews.text: Missing one egg lid limiting how many I can make so haven't used it yet
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: It was too much trouble. Of course, it didn't help that we forgot to oil the inside first. What a mess. Just threw it away after first experience. For us, we'll just stick with the old fashion way.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: best way to make hard boiled eggs
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy making hard boiled eggs in these. So easy to use , but make sure you use some spray oil on them.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara k

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but I was expecting hard clear plastic shells.
customer_reviews.author: Flyboy

customer_reviews.title: my favorite thing
customer_reviews.text: i love these. i do put coconut oil in them to help get the egg out. so easy to use. they didnt come with intructions though.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Marie

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like the oil with the egg gives it an odd texture. Will continue to make eggs the old fashioned way
customer_reviews.author: richard bloomquist

customer_reviews.title: Looks good can't wait to try
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to so you do not have to peel hard boiled eggs. Brown eggs do not peel well. Can't wait to try.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, no directions so a little trial and error but it's amazing
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great Egglettes with a holder!
customer_reviews.text: This egglettes with a holder is exactly what I needed, family is so happy with this one, will buy another one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money or time
customer_reviews.text: Cooked an extra 10 minutes after the recommended 16... and the yolk was still not cooked. Even the white had a funny taste. And weird texture. Threw away after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan P.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Easier to just peel the shell. Too much clean up and the egg gets soggy and breaks apart
customer_reviews.author: Amber Goff

customer_reviews.title: Use extra large eggs
customer_reviews.text: I used medium eggs, think that extra large would be better
customer_reviews.author: BOBBY STEWART

customer_reviews.title: Egg mold missing ridge to screw together
customer_reviews.text: I tried to reach out to you. I like the product, but some of my eggs are missing the "ridges" to screw together. Without the ridges this egg mold cannot be used. It will not screw together. Can yu please replace the 2 eggs that are not useable. Thank you. Carol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Advertised as 6 - Only five shells were in the box
customer_reviews.text: One of the pieces was missing from the set. Poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Majewski

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to buy the name brand Egglates. The silicone is flimsy and not all of the individual lids are threaded correctly and will not stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Austin

customer_reviews.title: Everything has it’s Pro’s & Con’s
customer_reviews.text: They do cook eggs, but ... the product was delivered without ANY directions on how to cook or clean. With the holder, a very large pot is required, which means it takes much longer to boil the water. It also took much longer to cook the eggs than normal - maybe because of the larger pot. The eggs are NOT perfectly shaped- the tops are flat so this is not good for deviled eggs. The product is ok but I would skip the holder. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't include everything in the picture.
customer_reviews.text: The product is nice, i'm just sad that it didn't include the cook book, since the main picture advertises the book with the product. If the 'items included' list wasn't missing it, i would call it false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more shells
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product especially the fact that there are no more shells. Makes fixing egg salad, tuna salad, and all other hard boiled egg side salads.
customer_reviews.author: Katemarie

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: One of the six has a hair inside the silicone egg holder. Very hard to get past it. Following the directions to the letter and the eggs still stick.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: According to advertisements, product should be easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.text: Have not used product since it arrived, hopefully will be used in near future for egg and potato salads.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Cardona

customer_reviews.title: Lids will not stay attached.
customer_reviews.text: No way to attach lids. They keep popping off. No instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: missing cap lid
customer_reviews.text: the box was smashed when it arrived. one cap was missing, we had email a few times, stating they would send the missing cap, which after a month, still dont have it.. so I used the five, worked good as seen on tv..
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The product is very easy to use, the eggs came out perfect and best of all no more peeling shells off of hard boiled eggs! Also cleans very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Shaliyan Egg Cooker-6 Pack 6 Exclusively and Holder 6 Nonstick Silicone Seen on TV Hard Boiler Poache, Standard, White/Red
product_meta.description:
Did You Know That You Can Hard-Boil Your Eggs Without Their Shell?

Shaliyan presents you with this amazing pack of 8 egg cookers that allow you to boil perfectly shaped oval eggs without their shell!

You can use these egg cooking cups to make any kind of egg dish you prefer:

• hard-boiled eggs
• soft-boiled eggs
• scrambled eggs
• eggs benedict
• mini omelets

The egg cooker set can also be used for boiling, poaching, and steaming, however, this is NOT a microwavable product.

Thanks to this innovative and practical egg boiling accessory, you will never have to remove an egg shell again!

Here’s What You Have To Do To Boil Eggs With The Egg Cookers:

1. Crack open 1-8 eggs.
2. Pour the raw eggs into the egg cooking cups (1 egg in each cup).
3. Screw the lids and place the egg cookers into a pot to boil.
4. Once ready, lift the cups from the egg cooker lid handle.
5. Remove the lids and turn the egg cookers upside down in a dish to serve the eggs.

That was easy, right?

You Can Trust The Shaliyan Egg Cooker Cups!

Our egg poaching cups are made with 100% nontoxic and BPA free silicone, so they’re absolutely safe to use.

At the same time, the nonstick poached egg cups are also heat resistant and dishwasher safe, so they will last a lifetime.

So What Are You Waiting For?

If you love eggs, get this amazing pack of 8 egg cookers and try it out! You will undoubtedly be impressed by the shell-less boiled eggs!

Don’t Waste Another Minute!

Scroll Up And Click The “Add to Cart” Button NOW!
